column1: #text=Last year I moved into a new house with my husband and my son .
#text=We decided that we wanted to start a garden .
#text=We planted flowers and vegetables , and we decided we would add a tree next to the garden .
#text=We knew that the tree would be a nice addition to the garden .
#text=Since I was unfamiliar with planting trees , I decided to look up different types of trees I could plant .
#text=I wanted to plant a tree that would grow well in our local climate .
#text=I went to the home and garden store to look at different trees .
#text=A salesperson helped me pick out a tree .
#text=I took it home and planted it according to the instructions .
#text=I made sure the soil was packed firmly at the base of the tree .
#text=Now that a year has passed , the tree has grown quite a bit .
#text=It is a nice plant that we all enjoy .
